description: OCW Studio manages deployments for OCW courses.

API_BEARER_TOKEN.description: Authorization bearer token for webhook endpoints

AWS_ACCESS_KEY_ID.description: AWS Access Key for S3 storage.

AWS_QUERYSTRING_AUTH.description: Enables querystring auth for S3 urls

AWS_SECRET_ACCESS_KEY.description: AWS Secret Key for S3 storage.

CELERY_BROKER_URL.description: Where celery should get tasks, default is Redis URL

CELERY_RESULT_BACKEND.description: Where celery should put task results, default is Redis URL

CONTENT_SYNC_BACKEND.description: The backend to sync websites/content with

CONTENT_SYNC_PIPELINE.description: The pipeline to preview/publish websites with

CONTENT_SYNC_RETRIES.description: Number of times to retry backend sync attempts

DRIVE_QUERY_SECONDS.description: The frequency to check for new google drive videos, in seconds

DRIVE_S3_UPLOAD_PREFIX.description: Prefix to be used for S3 keys of files uploaded from Google Drive

DRIVE_SERVICE_ACCOUNT_CREDS.description: The contents of the Service Account credentials JSON to use for Google API auth

DRIVE_SHARED_ID.description: ID of the Shared Drive (a.k.a. Team Drive). This is equal to the top-level folder ID.

GITHUB_WEBHOOK_BRANCH.description: Github branch to filter webhook requests against

GITHUB_WEBHOOK_KEY.description: Github secret key sent by webhook requests

GIT_BRANCH_MAIN.description: The default branch for a git repo

GIT_BRANCH_PREVIEW.description: The preview branch for a git repo

GIT_BRANCH_RELEASE.description: The release branch for a git repo

GIT_DEFAULT_USER_EMAIL.description: The email for the default git committer

GIT_DEFAULT_USER_NAME.description: The name for the default git committer

GIT_DOMAIN.description: Base URL of github for site repos

GIT_ORGANIZATION.description: The organization under which repos should be created

GIT_TOKEN.description: The authentication token for git commands

HEROKU_APP_NAME.description: The name of the review app

MAILGUN_KEY.description: The token for authenticating against the Mailgun API

MAILGUN_SENDER_DOMAIN.description: The domain to send mailgun email through

MAX_S3_GET_ITERATIONS.description: Max retry attempts to get an S3 object

MEDIA_ROOT.description: The root directory for locally stored media. Typically not used.

MIDDLEWARE_FEATURE_FLAG_COOKIE_MAX_AGE_S.description: Feature flag middleware cookie max age

MITOL_MAIL_FROM_EMAIL.description: E-mail to use for the from field

MITOL_MAIL_REPLY_TO_ADDRESS.description: E-mail to use for reply-to address of emails

NODE_MODULES_CACHE.description: If false, disables the node_modules cache to fix yarn install

OCW_IMPORT_STARTER_SLUG.description: The slug of the WebsiteStarter to assign to courses imported from ocw-to-hugo

OCW_STUDIO_BASE_URL.description: Base url for the application in the format PROTOCOL://HOSTNAME[:PORT]

OCW_STUDIO_DB_CONN_MAX_AGE.description: Maximum age of connection to Postgres in seconds

OCW_STUDIO_DB_DISABLE_SSL.description: Disables SSL to postgres if set to True

OCW_STUDIO_DRAFT_URL.description: The base url of the preview site

OCW_STUDIO_EMAIL_BACKEND.description: The default email backend to use for outgoing email. This is used in some places by django itself. See `NOTIFICATION_EMAIL_BACKEND` for the backend used for most application emails.

OCW_STUDIO_ENVIRONMENT.description: The execution environment that the app is in (e.g. dev, staging, prod)

OCW_STUDIO_FROM_EMAIL.description: E-mail to use for the from field

OCW_STUDIO_LIVE_URL.description: The base url of the live site

OCW_STUDIO_SITE_CONFIG_FILE.description: Standard file name for site config files

OCW_STUDIO_SITE_ID.description: The default site id for django sites framework

OCW_STUDIO_SUPPORT_EMAIL.description: Email address listed for customer support

OCW_STUDIO_USE_S3.description: Use S3 for storage backend (required on Heroku)

ROBOTS_CACHE_TIMEOUT.description: How long the robots.txt file should be cached

ROOT_WEBSITE_NAME.description: The Website name for the site at the root domain

SOCIAL_AUTH_SAML_CONTACT_NAME.description: The SAML contact name for our app

SOCIAL_AUTH_SAML_IDP_ATTRIBUTE_EMAIL.description: The IDP attribute for the user's email

SOCIAL_AUTH_SAML_IDP_ATTRIBUTE_NAME.description: The IDP attribute for the user's name

SOCIAL_AUTH_SAML_IDP_ATTRIBUTE_PERM_ID.description: The IDP attribute for the user's immutable ID

SOCIAL_AUTH_SAML_LOGIN_URL.description: The URL to redirect the user to for SAML login

SOCIAL_AUTH_SAML_SECURITY_ENCRYPTED.description: If True, SMAL assertions should be encrypted

STATUS_TOKEN.description: Token to access the status API.

USE_X_FORWARDED_HOST.description: Set HOST header to original domain accessed by user

USE_X_FORWARDED_PORT.description: Use the PORT from original url accessed by user

name: ocw_studio
